titles.title: As For Me, I Will Call On the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As for me, I will call upon the Lord.
I will call upon Thy name.
Early in the morning, I will lift my song to Thee.
For You are my shelter, my helper in all things.
You have delivered me from all my troubles,
And I will praise Your name.
I will sacrifice my life to Thee,
And I will praise Your name.
I will sacrifice my life to Thee.
Oh Lord, You are my strength.
